data.title: COI055: Aloha, aloha! Suit up!
data.text:
Episode #25 of Scottify is below. (Also, follow Scottify on Facebook.)

Not only was this was my second straight episode of Scottify essentially called on the fly (literally, the only thing I knew I was going to play ahead of time was Drive Like Jehu’s “Luau” and Gallows’ cover of Hot Snakes “If Credit’s What Matters I’ll Take Credit”), it was the first episode of Scottify not to air in its usual timeslot.

The reason for both of these things? Aubrey and I spent the long holiday weekend “camping” (read as: absolutely glamping) in southeastern Ohio, even popping over to West Virginia for about as long as it took to take a photo of the World’s Largest Teapot (honestly? not really worth it).

I was originally going to record a show in advance, but then fellow DJ Will of the Cowboy Kim Super Show (one of the best programs on WCSB, if you ask me) was unable to make his usual timeslot this week, so we decided to do a foreign exchange student program of sorts. Bonus: I got two hours of airtime instead of my usual one! You can hear my super-sized episode below, and if you want to hear what Will played in my timeslot, you can do so here (spoiler: he played a lot of good songs [and unfortunately also that new Fall Out Boy cover]).

Audio playback is not supported on your browser. Please upgrade.

And the playlist, for those interested…

BAND / SONG / ALBUM / LABEL / YEAR

Hot Snakes Death Doula Jericho Sirens Sub Pop 2018

Obits Put It In Writing One Cross Apiece EP Stint 2008

Drive Like Jehu Luau Yank Crime Interscope 1994

Built To Spill Goin' Against Your Mind You In Reverse Warner Bros. 2006

Volcano Suns White Elephant All-Night Lotus Party Homestead/Merge 1986

Murder By Death Strange Song Spell/Bound Tent Show 2022

Chris Farren Permanent For Me Where You Are EP self-released 2015

The Impossibles Connecticut Return Fueled By Ramen 2000

Lucero No Roses No More Lucero Madjack 2001

Hum Isle Of The Cheetah Downward Is Heavenward RCA 1998

Hot Rod Circuit Irish Car Bomb If I Knew Now What I Knew Then Triple Crown 1999

Ghost Work Fake Blood You'll Be Buried With Spartan 2023

Jimmy Eat World Christmas Card/Untitled Jimmy Eat World/Blueprint split 7-inch Abridged 1996

Blueprint In Between Angels Jimmy Eat World/Blueprint split 7-inch Abridged 1996

Copeland When Paula Sparks Beneath Medicine Tree The Militia Group 2003

Dan Andriano Way Too Many Times Dan Andriano/Mike Felumlee split EP Double Zero 2000

FIDLAR 40 oz On Repeat Too Mom + Pop 2015

Mean Jeans Party Line Gigantic Sike! Fat Wreck Chords 2019

Gallows If Credit's What Matters, I'll Take Credit In The Belly Of A Shark EP Warner Bros. 2007

Beach Slang 2000 Light Years Away Green Day: American Superhits! Kerrang! 2016

Torche In Bloom Whatever Nevermind Robotic Empire 2015

Have a request for next week’s show? Leave a comment or hit reply!
